name: Astrotastrophy
description:
Modifications:

1. Three unique levels leading up to a boss fight.

2. Three pick ups using my own sprites, two of which contain my own scripts, all three containing my own SFX.

3. An instructions page to the main menu.

4. Added custom particle FX to all pick ups.

5. Smaller details like audio adjustments, health adjustments, and other scripts to help the game feel more polished and smooth!

Credits:

Ian Q. Pope 2022

MSU GEL LAB 2020
